title: Manage Post-Event Traffic Flow
description: As a sold-out event ends, the operations center must manage the flow of vehicle and pedestrian traffic leaving the venue.

tasks.description: Coordinate with local police to manage traffic signals at key intersections near the venue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with police to prioritize traffic leaving the venue's parking lots.

tasks.description: Dispatch parking attendants and security to direct traffic within the parking lots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends staff to all major parking areas to direct drivers.

tasks.description: Use digital signage on nearby roadways to direct drivers to the least congested routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates digital signs with real-time traffic advice.

tasks.description: Monitor CCTV feeds of parking lots and roadways to identify and resolve any bottlenecks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent watches the cameras and re-deploys staff as needed to keep traffic moving.
